column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I treated myself to a pint of Blue Moon lager
column2: and sized up the menu. Obviously without question we ordered the pizza
column3: but the trick was what size? After conferring with our server who STRONGLY advised us that for 2 people we not go larger than a small... we scoffed but took him at his word. I must say now to him "thank you for the kind warning on how filling this stuff is - we barely made it through...."
